metadata.title: CVE-2017-12990 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The ISAKMP parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 could enter an infinite loop dueto bugs in print-isakmp.c, several functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
